message.name: ERR_HEARINGWITNESS_FV_WITNESS_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: This witness already exists for this hearing.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGWITNESS_FV_BEHALF_OF_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: The type of participant on whose behalf this witness is appearing must be provided.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGWITNESS_FV_CASE_CANCELLED
message.locale: This hearing case has already been canceled.
This hearing case has already been cancelled.
